Articles.Content:
Bonjour je signale un BUG, lorsque je souhaite me poser sur EVE, le sol de EVE devient tout noir et je vois l'univers au travers du sol de EVE, mon vaisseau explose en passant au travers de la planète EVE.

Conclusion : Impossible d'atterrir sur EVE.  

[Added Translation]
Hello I report a BUG, when I want to land on EVE, the ground EVE becomes all black and I see the universe through the ground EVE, my ship explodes passing through the planet EVE. Conclusion: Unable to land on EVE.

Edited June 9, 2019 by James Kerman
Added translation

Welcome to the forum @Foxray.

Unfortunately the forum is English only outside of the international section. You can use a service like google translate if you wish to post in the general forum.

[Edit] I have also moved your post to Technical Support, unmodded. Please mention if you are using mods.

[Translation]
Bienvenue sur le forum @Foxray. Malheureusement, le forum est uniquement en anglais en dehors de la section internationale. Vous pouvez utiliser un service tel que Google Translate si vous souhaitez poster sur le forum général.

[Modifier] J'ai également déplacé votre publication vers le support technique, sans modification. Veuillez indiquer si vous utilisez des mods.

Bonjour, merci bien; Oui j'utilise quelques modes mais rien en ce qui concerne l'univers et la carte pour le moment. Ce sont quelques modes de propulsions "FuelTanksPlus-2.0.2" "IXS_Class_for_StockKSP" "NearFuturePropulsion_1_1_1" "OPT+v2.0.1" "Squad" "XenonGasConvertVanilla". C'est tout.

Pour le Français je vois que le site traduit automatiquement donc ce n'est pas une gène dans la compréhension. 

Cordialement

[Translation]

Hello, thank you very much; Yes I use some modes but nothing about the universe and the map for the moment. These are some "FuelTanksPlus-2.0.2" "IXS_Class_for_StockKSP" "NearFuturePropulsion_1_1_1" "OPT + v2.0.1" "Squad" "XenonGasConvertVanilla" propulsion modes. That's all. For the French I see that the site automatically translates so it is not a gene in the understanding. cordially

Edited June 10, 2019 by James Kerman
Added translation

@Foxray I have moved your thread to Technical Support (PC, modded).

Unfortunately section 2.3c of the community guidelines states "All messages outside of the international sections should be in English or include an English translation." This is because some members may be viewing the forum on an internet browser that does not have an automatic translation function. I apologize for the inconvenience.
